Changelog
=========

Version 0.1.0 (Current)
-----------------------

Initial release of Barebones RPG Framework.

Features
~~~~~~~~

- Core game engine with event system
- Entity system with stats and leveling
- Turn-based combat system
- Item and inventory management
- Quest tracking
- Dialog trees
- World/map management
- AI interface system
- Save/load functionality
- Pygame renderer
- Example games

Upcoming
--------

Version 0.2.0 (Planned)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Enhanced AI system
- Additional combat actions
- More example games
- Performance improvements
- Extended documentation
